name: INTRALATINA composition 2017-10a
description: Intralatina is a complete program of modular elements that allows infinite possibilities for a wall composition. The compositions are divided into three families: fixed to the wall, fixed to back panelling (possibly self-supporting), or held up by vertical supports. They all combine storage units, shelves, and boxes in many dimensions and a wide variety of materials and finishes. This superb composition features panelling in ceramic with a glossy Statuario marble look, a storage unit on the right for electronic equipment, and 4 backlit metal shelves arranged to bring lightness to the composition.
